long_description: The sleek and sturdy Yakima SprocketRocket fork mount bike rack makes transporting your bike to the next ride a breeze. Strong and wide wheel tray holds tires from monster freeride bikes to the skinniest of road bikes-no adapters necessary. Secure skewer has an easy-to-use, integrated adjuster; skewer can be used with SKS lock cores, sold separately. Fits most disc brakes. Super-strong sliding wheel tray is easy to adjust so positioning the rear wheel is a no-brainer. The Yakima SprocketRocket doesn't touch any painted surfaces of your bike so no worries of scratches. Sleek design features a new black mirror finish to complement your automotive finish. Compatible with round and square bars.
short_description: The sleek and sturdy Yakima SprocketRocket fork mount bike rack makes transporting your bike to the next ride a breeze.
